snippet.title: X-Men: The Ravages of Apocalypse - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Part of my Obscure First Person Shooters series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2BBA1AB1CF53EEAC

Gameplay footage from the first map of X-Men: The Ravages of Apocalypse, a Quake total conversion. Yes, this was actually sold in stores.

How dare this game/retail total conversion call itself "X-Men"? It's missing all of the good characters! What kind of X-Men game/retail total conversion doesn't even include Batman? Screw this game/retail total conversion!

The full game is now available for free: http://www.zerogravity.com.au/portfolio0601.php
